CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.Name)), Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.Name, IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.Name)), Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.Name, IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Parent.Parent.Parent.Name)), Parent.Parent.Parent.Name, IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Parent.Parent.Name)), Parent.Parent.Name, IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Parent.Name)),Parent.Name, Name)))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The top level parent in the Account Hierarchy.
CustomField.label: Ultimate Parent
